title: Services to the Middle East
li1: Flights to Tel Aviv (TLV) will be suspended until October 31, 2024.
li2: Flights to Beirut (BEY) will be suspended until November 30, 2024.
li3: Flights to Tehran (IKA) will be suspended until October 31, 2024.
li4: Flights to Tehran (IKA) will be suspended until October 31, 2024.
